email_chain.subject: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, I hope this email finds you well. I have a vessel available for a crude oil shipment from Houston to Rotterdam. The vessel is the MV Ocean Star, 150,000 DWT, 280m LOA. Laycan is 15-20 October. Starting freight quote is $50.75 per metric ton. Let me know if this works for you or if you need further details. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the details. The laycan works for us, but the freight rate is a bit high. Can you come down to the low 50s? Also, could you confirm the demurrage rate? Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, thanks for your prompt reply. I can offer $50.25 per metric ton. The demurrage rate is $25,000 per day, pro rata. Let me know if this is acceptable. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, $50.25 sounds reasonable. We can proceed with this rate. Please confirm the laycan and demurrage terms, and we’ll finalize the charter party. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, great to hear. Laycan is confirmed for 15-20 October, and demurrage is $25,000 per day, pro rata. I’ll send over the charter party for your review shortly. Best, Sarah

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi Sarah, thanks for the confirmation. We’ll review the charter party and get back to you by end of day. Best, John

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Inquiry for Crude Oil Shipment
email_chain.body: Hi John, sounds good. Let me know if you need any further clarifications. Looking forward to finalizing this. Best, Sarah
